channel.title: COOLmanYT Blog
channel.description: Devlogs, reflections, and creator notes from COOLmanYT.

item.title: Social Media Ban
item.description: I dive deep into why Australia's proposed social media ban for under-16s is such a catastrophic mistake and how it affects everyone.

item.title: Building my Website using GPT-5 Codex (and some brains)
item.description: I created this entire website with a mix of GitHub Copilot, GPT-5 Codex, and my own stubbornness. Here is how the prototypes evolved into the current release candidate.
